head.title: Prokofiev Online Catalogue Archive and Visualization

div.p: PrOCAV is the first authoritative catalogue of works by Prokofiev, one of the twentieth century's greatest composers.

A relational database and digital archive, PrOCAV links Prokofiev Archive holdings, catalogue information and digitized sources to an authority title list . While digitally preserving Prokofiev's output, PrOCAV allows users to find Prokofiev's works, locate their primary sources, view manuscripts and build up a context for compositions. Thematic entries allow users to identify works and recognize musical relations.
